value.title: Money, mimicry and mind control: Big Tech slams ethics brakes on AI

value.title: US government forms committee to advise on AI competitiveness, ethics
value.excerpt: The newly-formed committee will advise the President of AI matters. It's no surprise that artificial intelligence is the future. So much so that the Department of Commerce is forming the National Artificial Intelligence Advisory Committee to focus on a range of issues related to AI.

value.title: AI Self-Driving Cars And The Looming Aggregated Statistical Trolley Dilemma
